title: Parashant Grand Canyon-Parashant National Monument: Park Home
body: Where the West Stays Wild  Parashant provides a sense of solitude to those who venture into its isolated domain. The Monument's expansive landscape encompasses a chronicle of natural and cultural history that is just waiting to be discovered. For those prepared and equipped to explore the largely undeveloped landscape, a trip into the Parashant is a journey into the wild.              Parashant Night Sky   Parashant International Night Sky Province            Service First Authority   The Grand Canyon-Parashant National Monument is jointly managed by the Bureau of Land Management (BLM) and the National Park Service (NPS).         Wilderness   Experience dramatic and remote wilderness in the Parashant.
